pages.text: Note: some of the mod features described in this section might change later, the curse system is still WIP.
The curse altar is found in a large temple structure in the demon realm. It is required for creating curses.

Creating a curse can be done in 3 simple steps. First, the curse recipe is put together. This is done by adding any valid curse ingredient to the cauldron. You can only add up to 5 different ingredients, and up to 10 total ingredients to a curse. During this step, you can also add an enchanted mirror shard to make the curse much stronger, but make it affect the creator (you) as well.
The second step is to finalize the curse, making it impossible to add new ingredients but allowing you to cast it. This can be done by using a demonic gem on the cauldron.

The third step is to actually apply the curse. Curses can be applied telepathically, by using a needle with the target's blood. However, this makes it INCREDIBLY weak. Instead, it's much more effective to apply the curse on a food item and trick the target into consuming it. Traditionally an apple is used, but any food item will work.
The following pages will list various ingredients, as well as their effects on a curse.
